headline: CoreSite Expands Silicon Valley Campus with Completion of 228,000-Square-Foot, AI-Ready Data Center
summary: DENVER, July 30, 2025--CoreSite, an American Tower company (NYSE: AMT) empowering critical business and AI workloads that impact everyday life through interconnected data center solutions, today announced the completion of a major expansion at its Silicon Valley campus. Designed to meet soaring demand for high-density, high-performance compute environments that power artificial intelligence (AI), cloud and mission-critical workloads, the company’s new purpose-built, AI-ready SV9 data center adds

content.title: CoreSite Expands Silicon Valley Campus with Completion of 228,000-Square-Foot, AI-Ready Data Center
content.summary: DENVER, July 30, 2025--CoreSite, an American Tower company (NYSE: AMT) empowering critical business and AI workloads that impact everyday life through interconnected data center solutions, today announced the completion of a major expansion at its Silicon Valley campus. Designed to meet soaring demand for high-density, high-performance compute environments that power artificial intelligence (AI), cloud and mission-critical workloads, the company’s new purpose-built, AI-ready SV9 data center adds

thumbnail.caption: CoreSite’s SV9 data center is located at 2915 Stender Way, Santa Clara, Calif. and offers more than 228,000 square feet to the company’s Silicon Valley footprint.
